card.name: Cealin Monk
card.text: Kicker 1W (You may pay an additional 1W as you cast this spell.) When Cealin Monk enters, if it was kicked, put a +1/+1 counter on it then draw a card.

card.name: Arken Spite
card.text: Destroy target attacking creature unless its controller pays an amount of colorless mana equal to twice that creatures mana value.

card.name: Arken Tactician
card.text: When Arken Tactician enters, shuffle each card in your graveyard named Arken Tactician into your library. {T}: Another target creature you control gets +1/+0 or +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Auric Barrier
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and target creature you control this turn.

card.name: Cealin Aeromancer
card.text: Empire — As long as there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, Cealin Aeromancer has flying

card.name: Moon Summons
card.text: Create a flying 4/4 white Angel creature token. If you control an attacking creature, that token enters tapped and attacking.

card.name: Nullify Pain
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target creature you control. When Nullify Pain prevents the damage a creature an opponent controls would deal this way, Nullify Pain deals that much damage to that creature.

card.name: Preparations
card.text: Flash When Preparations enters, you gain 4 life. Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Reap Wheat
card.text: Kicker 1W (You may pay an additional 1W as you cast this spell.) You gain 1 life for each land you control. If Reap Wheat was kicked you gain 1 life for each land on the battlefield instead.

card.name: Replenish Stamina
card.text: Kicker WW (You may pay an additional WW as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If Replenish Stamina was kicked, that creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Siege Griffin
card.text: Flying Mount 1W (1W, {T}: Another non-riding creature you control rides this creature for as long as it remains tapped. You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step as long as it is being ridden.) Whenever Siege Griffin’s rider attacks, it gets +1/+1 each other attacking creature you control.

card.name: Unlikely Alliance
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. Monkey and Human creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Tear from Memory
card.text: Counter target spell. Draw a card

card.name: Willed to Exist
card.text: Whenever you cast an aura, create a 1/1 blue Elemental creature token. You may attach that aura to that token instead

card.name: Dredge Edge
card.text: Dredge Edge enters tapped.

card.name: Apocalypse Rider
card.text: Deathtouch When Apocalypse Rider enters, you may return a creature with mount from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Bog Fiend
card.text: Flying Whenever Bog Fiend deals combat damage to a player, discard a card.

card.name: Hallowed Guard
card.text: Hallowed Guard enters tapped. Empire — When Hallowed Guard dies, if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Unholy Behemoth
card.text: Mount 2B (2B, {T}: Another non-riding creature you control rides this creature for as long as it remains tapped. You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step as long as it is being ridden.) When Unholy Behemoth’s rider dies, each opponent loses life equal to that creatures mana value.

card.name: Immense Anger
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has double strike and menace. (Creature with menace can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Battle Strategy
card.text: Kicker 2RR (You may pay an additional 2RR as you cast this spell.) Discard a card then draw two cards. If Battle Strategy was kicked, discard your hand then draw three cards instead.

card.name: Blue Eyed Dragon
card.text: Flying 2R: Blue Eyed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Arken Sorceror
card.text: RRR: Arken Sorceror gets +2/+0 until end of turn. 5RRR: Create three 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste.

card.name: Driven Mad
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. That creature gains haste and menace until end of turn.

card.name: Firetrail
card.text: Firetrail deals 2 damage to target creature and 2 damage to it’s rider. It’s rider is no longer riding that creature.

card.name: Goblin Maniac
card.text: Haste When Goblin Maniac dies, it deals 1 damage to each player.

card.name: Hoarding Sprite
card.text: Haste {T}: Hoarding Sprite deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.

card.name: Kird Avenger
card.text: Haste Whenever Kird Avenger attacks, it deals 2 damage to each player.

card.name: Goblin Ambush
card.text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. If Goblin Ambush isn’t the first spell you’ve cast this turn, create three of those tokens instead.

card.name: Fireblast Witch
card.text: Haste Empire — 3R: Fireblast Witch deals 2 damage to any noncreature target. Activate only if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control

card.name: Warfront Hound
card.text: Haste Mount 1R (1R, {T}: Another non-riding creature you control rides this creature for as long as it remains tapped. You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step as long as it is being ridden.) Warfront Hound’s rider has haste.

card.name: Adaptive Predator
card.text: Trample Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on another creature you control, put that many +1/+1 counters on Adaptive Predator.

card.name: Ambush Elf
card.text: Reach Whenever Ambush Elf is dealt damage while it is blocking, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Frontier Guide
card.text: When Frontier Guide enters, you may put a land card from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Throng Simian
card.text: Other Monkey creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Wandering Beast
card.text: Trample Mount 1G (1G, {T}: Another non-riding creature you control rides this creature for as long as it remains tapped. You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step as long as it is being ridden.) Wandering Beast’s rider gets +1/+1 and has trample.

card.name: Reap Sorrow
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You gain life equal to the number of non-generic mana symbols among cards revealed this way and that player loses that much life.

card.name: Hypercognition
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0. When Hypercognition enters, you may have enchanted creature deals damage equal to its power to target opponent or planeswalker an opponent controls.

card.name: Helix Field
card.text: A deck can have any number of cards named Helix Field. Helix Field enters tapped. {T}: Add {C}. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more lands named Helix Field, you win the game.

card.name: Patrol Ridge
card.text: As Patrol Ridge enters, reveal up to two cards from your hand. Patrol Ridge enters tapped unless red and white were among the colors of cards revealed this way. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Rooted Tropics
card.text: As Rooted Tropics enters, reveal up to two cards from your hand. Rooted Tropics enters tapped unless green and blue were among the colors of cards revealed this way. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Unstable Terrain
card.text: As Unstable Terrain enters, reveal up to two cards from your hand. Unstable Terrain enters tapped unless blue and red were among the colors of cards revealed this way. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Arken Healer
card.text: {T}: You gain 1 life Empire — {T}: You gain 2 life. Activate only if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Arken Phalanx
card.text: Vigilance Empire — Whenever Arken Phalanx attacks, if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, Arken Phalanx gains indestructible until of turn

card.name: Ascendant Knight
card.text: Whenever Ascendant Knight attacks or blocks, each player gains 1 life.

card.name: Assess Forces

card.name: Barracks
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has “{T}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.”

card.name: Breath of the Ancients
card.text: You gain 4 life. Empire — If there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, you gain 10 life instead.

card.name: Battlefront Sorceress
card.text: Empire — Whenever Battlefront Sorceress attacks, choose one. If there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, choose two instead— • Tap target creature defending player controls. • Create a tapped and attacking 2/2 white Knight creature token. • Damage that would be dealt to other creatures you control this turn is dealt to Battlefront Sorceress instead.

card.name: Illuminated Blades
card.text: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance and lifelink.

card.name: Light in the Dark
card.text: Tap or untap target creature. Remove that creature from combat. Draw a card

card.name: Persisting Justice
card.text: Enchant creature Sacrifice Persisting Justice: Enchanted creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Empire — When Persisting Justice is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, draw a card.

card.name: Plated Griffin
card.text: Flying, vigilance Mount 2W (2W, {T}: Another non-riding creature you control rides this creature for as long as it remains tapped. You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step as long as it is being ridden.) Plated Griffin’s rider has flying and vigilance.

card.name: Resilient Infantry
card.text: Lifelink

card.name: Ruos Kareed
card.text: When Ruos Kareed enters, you gain 10 life. [+3]: Until your next turn, Ruos Kareed becomes an 8/8 white Monkey creature with vigilance in addition to his other types. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him by creatures not attacking him. [-X]: Your life total becomes equal to the number of loyalty counters removed from Ruos Kareed.

card.text: Target creature gets +2/+3 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: True Valor

card.name: Progressive Knowledge
card.text: Suspend 2—3UU (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay 3UU and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Progressive Knowledge, draw a card. Draw two cards.

card.name: Royal Toast
card.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Tap target creature. If Royal Toast was kicked, that creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

card.name: Huhn Witch

card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains “{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.”

card.name: Æthersphere Mage
card.text: Flying When Æthersphere Mage enters, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Blunt Lessons
card.text: Each player can’t draw cards during their draw step. Whenever a player casts a spell, each player draws a card.

card.name: Eldritch Vision
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put a card from among them into your hand. If you do, put a card from your hand on the top of your library. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.text: When Huhn Prophet enters, you may search your library for a card. If you do, shuffle your library then put that card beneath the top two cards of your library.

card.name: Fleshrend

card.name: The Great 10 Plagues

card.text: Destroy target blocking creature. Empire — If there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, all creatures blocked by that creature gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Frightful Discovery

card.name: Point of No Return
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player loses 1 life. Whenever a creature dies, its controller gains 1 life.

card.text: Whenever a player discards one or more cards card or pays life, create a 2/1 black Warlock creature token.

card.text: As Rotten Wilds enters, reveal up to two cards from your hand. Rotten Wilds enters tapped unless black and green were among the colors of cards revealed this way. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Sundered Cathedral
card.text: As Sundered Cathedral enters, reveal up to two cards from your hand. Sundered Cathedral enters tapped unless white and black were among the colors of cards revealed this way. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

card.name: Arcane Phantom
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a spell during an opponents turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Arcane Phantom.

card.name: Cealin Spellblade
card.text: 2U, {T}: Each player draws a card. Then each player discards a card unless they pay {1}.

card.name: Quicken Witch
card.text: Hexproof {T}: Remove a time counter from a suspended card you own.

card.name: Æthersteed Mage
card.text: 2U: Exile Æthersteed Mage a creature it is riding. Then return those creatures to the battlefield. You may have Æthersteed Mage ride the other creature.

card.name: Huhn Fae
card.text: Flying Empire — Whenever Huhn Fae deals combat damage to a player, if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: In Time
card.text: Suspend 30—{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {U} and exile it with thirty time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Whenever you cast a spell, remove a time counter from In Time. You win the game if you cast In Time from exile. Otherwise, exile In Time with fifteen time counters.

card.name: Caelin Mage
card.text: When Caelin Mage enters, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play cards exiled this way until end of turn.

card.name: Shimmering Distraction
card.text: Kicker—Pay 2 life (You may pay 2 life in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Look at target players hand. If Shimmering Distraction was kicked, draw a card.

card.name: Shoregreet Leviathan
card.text: Shoregreet Leviathan can’t be blocked. Mount 8UU (8UU, {T}: Another non-riding creature you control rides this creature for as long as it remains tapped. You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step as long as it is being ridden.) Shoregreet Leviathan’s rider gets +3/+2 and can’t be blocked.

card.name: Huhn Interrogator
card.text: Flash When Huhn Interrogator enters, tap target creature. That creatures controller reveals their hand.

card.name: Witch's Apprentice
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with more than one target, you may have Witch’s Apprentice become an additional target of that spell. Whenever an opponent casts a spell targeting Witch’s Apprentice, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Twist Space
card.text: Exile target attacking creature, return that creature to the battlefield tapped attacking target player that doesn’t control it. If you are targeted this way, remove that creature from combat.

card.name: Caelin Equilizer
card.text: Sacrifice Caelin Equilizer: Target creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power until end of turn.

card.name: Centaur Avenger
card.text: Haste Whenever Centaur Avenger attacks, you may put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

card.name: Capital Guard
card.text: Defender, vigilance As long as Capital Guard is riding another creature, Capital Guard can attack as though it didn’t have defender and it assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

card.name: Caelin Galvanizer
card.text: Suspend 3—WW When Caelin Galvanizer enters, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. Those creatures have haste if Caelin Galvanizer entered from exile this turn.

card.name: Prove Wrong
card.text: Kicker 1W (You may pay an additional 1W as you cast this spell.) Put target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard onto the battlefield. If Prove Wrong was kicked, return it to your hand as it resolves.

card.name: Kareed Missionary
card.text: Whenever Kareed Missionary attacks, tap up to one target creature defending player controls.

card.name: Wandering Hero
card.text: Lifelink

card.name: Gallows Chant
card.text: You gain 1 life for each creature that entered the battlefield this turn and for each creature that died this turn. Each opponent loses life equal to the amount you gained this way.

card.name: Dying's Vengeance
card.text: Kicker—Sacrifice a creature (You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Destroy target creature or planeswalker. If Dying’s Vengeance was kicked, destroy an additional target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Progressive Decay
card.text: Suspend 3—3BB (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay 3BB and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Progressive Decay, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Jhetesh Witch
card.text: Empire — When Jhetesh Witch enters, if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Master of Witchcraft
card.text: {B}, {T}: Create a 2/1 Warlock creature token. Whenever Master of Witchcraft or another creature enters under your control, each opponent loses 1 life. If that creature is a Warlock, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Last Kiss
card.text: Last Kiss deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Crashing Boar
card.text: Trample Empire — When Crashing Boar dies, if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Caelin Valiant
card.text: Suspend 6—1W Whenever one or more creatures attack you, if Caelin Valiant is suspended, remove a time counter from it. Lifelink

card.name: Hunger for Flesh
card.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. If Hunger for Flesh was kicked, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens instead.

card.name: Radiant Powerstone
card.text: {T}: Untap another target permanent. {5}, {Q}: Tap target permanent.

card.name: Animated Roots
card.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, that land produces an additional mana of that color. Empire — As long as there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, enchanted land is a 3/3 green elemental creature in addition to its other types. It is still a land.

card.name: Riejor, Arken Progenitor
card.text: Haste Whenever Riejor attacks, put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the power of the creature it is riding.

card.name: Journey's End
card.text: Whenever a land enters under your control, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • Each player draws a card. • Untap target land.

card.name: Lightrunner Bolt
card.text: Lightrunner Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature. Add four mana of any color, then draw a card.

card.name: Burnt Fate
card.text: Choose one— • Counter target spell • Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Eldritch Steed
card.text: Eldritch Steed can’t be blocked. Mount 3UU (3UU, {T}: Another non-riding creature you control rides this creature for as long as it remains tapped. You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step as long as it is being ridden.) Eldritch Steed’s rider can’t be blocked.

card.name: Huhn Synchrocaster
card.text: Suspend 1—3GG (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay 3GG and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) When Huhn Synchrocaster enters, if you cast it from exile, add GG.

card.name: Swept through Time
card.text: Return target creature to its owner’s hand. Empire — If there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, put that creature on top of its owner’s library instead.

card.name: Rugged Brawl
card.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any other target. If Rugged Brawl was kicked and targeted two or more creatures, both creatures deal damage equal to their power to themselves instead.

card.name: Darkbolt Witch
card.text: Haste {T}: Darkbolt Witch deals 1 damage to each player.

card.name: Fury Bursts
card.text: Suspend 2—3R (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay 3R and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Fury Bursts, target creature gains menace until end of turn. Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. That creature gains haste and menace until end of turn.

card.name: Realign
card.text: Kicker 2U (You may pay an additional 2U as you cast this spell.) Tap target creature. If Realign was kicked, tap another target creature and creatures tapped by Realign don’t untap during their controllers next untap step.

card.name: Soulseeper
card.text: Lifelink Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses that much life.

card.name: Gather Strength
card.text: Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Jhetesh Ritual
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Jhetesh Ritual, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to that creatures power.

card.name: Mysterious Disapearance
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent. That permanent gains suspend, put two time counters on it.

card.name: Landwill
card.text: Target land becomes a copy of target permanent you control.

card.name: Fabled Swordsman
card.text: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) When Fabled Swordsman enters, if it was kicked, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Wartime Archangel
card.text: Flying, vigilance Wartime Archangel must attack and block each turn if able

card.name: Cloudcover Aven

When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Cloudcover Aven, look at the top two cards of your library. Put them back on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Steel Sarcophagus
card.text: Empire — As long as there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, Steel Sarcophagus is a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature.

card.text: Empire — As long as there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, Kareed’s Chosen has vigilance and lifelink.

card.name: Amplify Grief
card.text: Choose target player. For each creature that died this turn, that player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.) Draw a card

card.name: Worshipped Angel
card.text: Whenever Worshipped Angel attacks, it gets +1/+1 for each untapped creature you control. Tap an untapped creature you control: Worshipped Angel gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Progressive Destiny
card.text: Suspend 6—2W (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay 2W and exile it with six time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Progressive Destiny, you gain 1 life. You gain 6 life.

card.name: Gong Keeper
card.text: Whenever another creature enters under your control, creatures you control get +0/+1 until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Progressive Bolt
card.text: Suspend X XR (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay XR and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Progressive Bolt, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. Progressive Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Chained Monstrosity
card.text: Trample Chained Monstrosity can’t attack or block unless you have lost life this turn.

card.name: Darkstar Elemental
card.text: Whenever Darkstar Elemental or another creature you control dies, target player loses 1 life.

card.name: Darkstar Mage
card.text: When Darkstar Mage dies, at the beginning of the next end step, you gain life equal to the amount of life your opponents have lost this turn

card.name: Muckstrider Witch

card.name: Bloodspear Shaman
card.text: Whenever Bloodspear Shaman deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Forge Patron gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Boneyard Dragon

card.name: Infected Warrior
card.text: BB, {T}: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Roofjumper
card.text: Intimidate (This creature can’t be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) 2BB: Regenerate Roofjumper. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn’t. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Scorched Grounds
card.text: Whenever you lose unspent mana by ending a phase during your turn, at the beginning of the next phase, Scorched Grounds deals X damage to each opponent. Where X is the amount of mana lost this way.

card.name: The Raven Man
card.text: [+2]: Each player sacrifices a nontoken creature. [-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.” [-10]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature dies, draw a card.”

card.name: Guide of Ruos
card.text: Mount 2W (2W, {T}: Another non-riding creature you control rides this creature for as long as it remains tapped. You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step as long as it is being ridden.) As long as Guide of Ruos is riding a creature, Guide of Ruos and that creature each have indestructible.

card.name: Clockworker
card.text: Whenever Clockworker enters or attacks, you may remove a time counter from a suspended card you own in exile. {T}: Each player exiles the top card of their library. If a card with suspend is exiled this way, put a number of time counters on it equal to its suspend number.

card.name: Last Battle
card.text: Target creature you control gains haste, double strike, and menace until end of turn. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Druidic Masterpiece
card.text: Empire — As long as there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, Druidic Masterpiece has indestructible and it assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

card.name: Void Guardian
card.text: Trample This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card you own in exile.

card.name: Punisher Bolt
card.text: Punisher Bolt deals 2 damage to target creature. Empire — If there are three or more basic land types among lands you control, Punisher Bolt deals 4 damage to that creature instead.

card.name: Shaman Trio
card.text: When Shaman Trio enters, create two 1/1 green Shaman creature tokens. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control more creatures than an opponent, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Demon's Pawn
card.text: When Demon’s Pawn enters, you lose 2 life. When Demon’s Pawn dies, draw a card.

card.name: Temple of the Fallen Gods
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Empire — {T}: Add CC. Activate only if there are three or more basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Resonance Orb
card.text: {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Rotspawn
card.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put an undeath counter on Rotspawn. When Rotspawn dies, create a number of 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens equal to the number of undeath counters on Rotspawn.

card.name: Mage Relic
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mage Relic: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mage Relic: Draw a card.

card.name: Fanatic Warmage
card.text: Prowess Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Fanatic Warmage gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Corrupted Simian
card.text: Corrupted Simian can’t block.

card.name: Astral Goddess
card.text: {T}: Move a time counter from a card you own in exile onto Astral Goddess. 1U, Remove a time counter from Astral Goddess: Scry 1. {T}, Remove five time counters from Astral Goddess: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Blind Sustenance
card.text: Whenever you would draw a card, you may Scry 2 instead. Sacrifice Blind Sustenance: Scry 2 then draw a card.

card.name: Feathercloak Battlemage
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Feathercloak Battlemage deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Then discard a card unless you’ve cast a noncreature spell this turn.

card.name: Feathercloak Witch
card.text: Hexproof Tap an untapped creature you control: Feathercloak Witch gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Gifts from Oblivion
card.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Choose one. If Gifts from Oblivion was kicked, choose both— • Scry 4 then draw two cards. • Remove two time counters any number of suspended cards you own.
